# Security Policy

## Supported Versions

We support the latest version of each repository. Please ensure you are running the most recent release before reporting an issue.

| Version | Supported          |
| ------- | ------------------ |
| Latest  | :white_check_mark: |
| < Last  | :x:                |

## Reporting a Vulnerability

Please do not report security vulnerabilities via public GitHub issues. Instead, email us at security@extended-data-library.org.

We will acknowledge your report within 48 hours and provide a timeline for resolution.
